entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Vernon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:22 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vernon 12:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: 2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -0.9°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries near noon then 40 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snow level near valley bottom. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
